content:
CreatingModelDataSourceEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that handles the CreatingModelDataSource and CreatingModelDataSource events.

In this Article

public delegate void CreatingModelDataSourceEventHandler(object sender, CreatingModelDataSourceEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
